properties.Name: Taghum Bridge
properties.Description: The Taghum Footbridge Society is currently working on a crowdfunding campaign to build an active transportation link accross the Kootenay River. For more information and donation platform, please visit: https://taghumbridge.org/

properties.Name: Slocan Rail - Hwy 6 Crossing
properties.Description: Need for New Safe Hwy Crossing

properties.Name: Nelson North Shore Shoulder Improvements
properties.Description: The WKCC is working with the RDCK, MOTI, and YRB to make improvements to the Nelson North Shore section of Highway 3A from Nelson to Balfour.
